article: president clinton asserted friday that he and the democratic national committee have `` played by the rules '' in their aggressive fund-raising tactics , but he pledged that in a second term he would push to ban the kinds of contributions from foreigners that recently have plunged the white house and the party into controversy .
abstract: clinton defends fund-raising but advocates rules changes
